project_abstract.cdata: The project would finance the foreign exchange cost of industrial projects carried out by private enterprises in Pakistan. The project includes provision for training of textile industry personnel, and technical assistance to the Ministry of Industry and PICIC. Training subprojects would include the modernization of a number of textile training institutes, in-plant training, foreign training of technical and managerial personnel, and technical assistance. In addition, the Government will engage a textile specialist who would assist the Ministry of Industries for one year in implementing textile rehabilitation measures, including training, and subsequently PICIC for one year.
